body.u: quite a few so far sort of um quite a good response but like couldn not I mean only sort of the people that we know send stuff in it's not like it's been loads yet but
it's only just got going so
yeah it's only yeah it's only early days isn't it
mm so have you been bugging people with it?
well I tried the family and they're just not interested
so um my sister went absolutely mental
could you covert co did she? Why?
she was like it's my privacy no er you're not allowed to record me and you're not allowed to do it covertly
and I was like tut oh
you've got your mum on side though surely?
just like get your mum on side like
yeah get my mum on side I'm pretty sure I can do that she went a bit funny about it but I was like it's happening
I'm gonna take her to the garden centre on Saturday
er she needs to get plants for the garden and it's her birthday soon so yeah
are you gonna buy something nice?
yeah get her a few bits and the weather was supposed to be nice on Saturday but I don't think it's gonna last
I think it's gonna be warmish but not very nice I think she's quite keen to get out in the garden
of course she wants someone to mow the lawn
like man of the household you know
okay so that's like seventeen seventeen pence
have you got curry? Curry soup?
mm I think so I don't know I've not made it
um it's cooled off a bit now
so that's good it hasn't been one particular thing um
but there was an awful awful lot of grilling for a time
I mean it is a problem if you get really bored but at least you're having your dinner cooked for you I suppose
that's true they coo what did they cook last night? That took them like ages
but it was really nice it was like made too much rice the next day so we'd had it had it for tea
like with like um a sort of Chinese fish sort of style
went with a um little spice man
got like a shop you know like you on Histon R you know where Al Aldi is?
you've told me about him yeah
is it that little row of shops just before you get to the garage then?
it's just on the corn on the bottom

Don't know if you'd like a fruit tree but they're um selling apple trees for four pounds
think maybe you could add that to the um garden
well the lemon's not that it's grown are about that big now
they must have the tender loving touch or something whatever it's called
mm so got her navy entrance exam today
oh really? So she's gone through with it?
oh yeah so you have to
gotta do the application which she did
and then if you're not like if you've actually like got GCSEs
um They let you through then you have to do the the you know like they do the civil testing
has she got a d she got a degree?
she's got yeah she's got a degree in languages she can't find her certificates so I was like just write to the exam board and they print them out for you
and she she did that and then they said it would be like twenty-five pounds for each exam

and you've got different exam boards charging different amounts it's ridiculous she's gonna go along today and do the test but it was in Peterborough and it was really hard like she was reading me out some of the questions it's split down into like English maths comprehension
mechanical comprehension the English ones I could do fine maths a bit of a struggle

with like my long division fine mechanical comprehension oh my God it's insane it's like actually you'd be probably quite good at it cos you've got a good brain but it was like you launch these things with a s with different different charges and which one goes the furthest from your ship
or is it the same? And I said oh well the one with the biggest charge
and then they're like no no it's the same
and I was like oh I don't understand like she t texted me um just now and said that she'd had to like explain how to wire a plug and
yeah she said that it was really hard
I mean that's a bit different to what she's doing at the minute like
is she really gonna go through with it?
doesn't she have to do the fitness thing?
yep that's only if she gets through this stage though so like if she fails today she has to wait a year
and by that point she'll have missed out on um being an officer
so you go in at ratings levels sort of are you like cannon fodder
and you get paid thirteen grand a year less
is she really serious about it though?

it sounds nuts to me no well I dunno she is pretty serious but I don't know whether that's just to er cover up the fact that her mum's mental and her dad's had some grisly accident and just doesn't love her and
oh yeah what's going on with that? Did she go to London with him?
he called last weekend to say oh I dunno whether it's a very good idea and she went ballistic at him
and I said well fair enough like he has now got like he started seeing this girl the whole time but
so is he still seeing that other girl?
yeah but they've now had the conversation like not let's be boyfriend and girlfriend but let's make more time for each other so it's getting a bit more serious
yeah then he's gone to London with her

yeah so he was then like had an attack of the conscience she went mental because she said well I w you know I'm never gonna get my money back and you should've said that you were worried about this blah blah blah And you never put me first and I was like
can't she just date someone else?
yeah and I said well he's sort of within his own rights to do that like
yeah no he has to go home
he didn't know a month ago that he was gonna care that much about her but at the same time like it's totally normal that she's gonna feel like this which
yeah imagine if it was her like if you know
she has put herself in this position and she says I can't not because it's the only way I'll get over him and I said
you know this is gonna hurt like hell and she said yeah I need it to cos otherwise I'll never move on so this is God girls we are so s sadistic and we're so
mean to each other so at the moment they're going through with it so they're gonna stay in the same bed in the same hotel I just to me like I it's just massive alarm bells
it's madness that this this other girl will just be sort of
I wouldn't let that happen if I liked someone they wouldn't do that I would be like you do that and then then obviously I don't mean anything to you so off you
yeah game game over really it's that sort of difficult beginning stage isn't it but
still like for a bloke to go and spend a h a night in a hotel with his ex-girlfriends that's weird
it's finding those boundaries again isn't it that's the problem
like trying to learn how to stay friends really you just have to give it time
that's what that's what I've been saying to her and she's like yeah I agree but he's not giving her the space so he contacts her like oh how's it going or this thing happened or
as if they're still together and he's not making it any easier even when she said to him like leave me alone and give a bit of space
he doesn't know how to do that he says
mm he's broken up with that girl
well it turns out they got really pissed last Friday night
when you were in the village?

the week before I was in the village the week before this was last Friday um he went to her house and I saw him the next day and he was like oh yeah we've had a bit of a falling out and at the time he thought it was because he'd left in the middle of the night becau and he'd left
why did he leave in the middle of the night?
because apparently he can't sleep when he's pissed even though he'd said I wanna stay over
and then he got up and left and he said oh I think she's a bit annoyed like that I'm a love them and leave them and I said well
and just like tell me it'd be no you're there every day and you've been shagging for a week so clearly
that's not what this is it turns out she said he was really rough with her

like in the middle of the night he tried it on with her and she was like oh my God what are you doing? Which to me doesn't sound like that big a deal like being woken up by a guy sort of pawing at you
probably not ideal but it's sort of what happens
it's how far he takes it and
you're gonna say no like obviously we don't know what happened but apparently
no I think they must've it must've been like serious because if it was just somebody being a bit amorous and you were like urgh get off
well I dunno I think she apparently turns out she was raped
and so she is probably very sensitive about that sort of thing anyway um so whether he was but Imogen said the same thing not the or anything like that but when they obviously
got together at my house party she said he was all over her like a rash like she was really
and I think that's why she left she was a bit freaked out and I think he probably is like if he's
probably is a bit too much

like he doesn't know when to stop and he was saying oh like it's really opened my eyes to the kind of person I am and I know she can't be with me right now but I know that we feel er something for each other and I was like well it's only been three weeks what are you talking about? But anyway so he was texting her yesterday and um I don't know I don't think they're together cos I can't think they'll get back together
at this point I don't really care
you know like if you moved in with some people who are really normal you be really r you'd be so bored
you'd have nothing to tell me
